snippet: Lance Armstrong, now barred from competing in all Olympic sports, reportedly has told associates that he may admit he used performance-enhancing drugs during his cycling career.
abstract: Lance Armstrong is considering publicly admitting that he used banned performance-enhancing drugs and blood transfusions during his cycling career; Armstrong would be seeking to persuade antidoping officials to restore his eligibility so he can resume his athletic career.
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong, now barred from competing in all Olympic sports, reportedly has told associates that he may admit he used performance-enhancing drugs during his cycling career.

headline.seo: Lance Armstrong Said to Weigh Admission of Doping
headline.main: In Reversal, Armstrong Is Said to Weigh Admitting Drug Use
headline.print_headline: In Reversal, Armstrong Is Said To Weigh Admitting Drug Use
